name: Dice Mayhem
description:
Description

   This is a very simple submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2022! Unfortunately, my partner and I had less than a day to work on it, but we got it done and we hope you all enjoy it! For some screen sizes, the game may not all be shown.

Rules

      Protect the golden die by rolling dice into the cards that try and take it out! You can also hit the golden die to make it roll into the cards for double points! See how high of a high score you can get!

Controls

  • Left-click on the mouse to shoot a die where the mouse is positioned
  • Right-click on the mouse to switch sides
